org.mechio.api.motion.sync

Class SynchronizedRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeNotifier
      • org.mechio.api.motion.AbstractRobot<org.mechio.api.motion.sync.SynchronizedJoint>
        • org.mechio.api.motion.sync.SynchronizedRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeSource, Robot<org.mechio.api.motion.sync.SynchronizedJoint>

    public class SynchronizedRobot
extends AbstractRobot<org.mechio.api.motion.sync.SynchronizedJoint>
    Holds multiple Robots and synchronizes their movements for the given JointIds. Events and JointProperties from the primary Robot are forwarded.
    Author:
    Matthew Stevenson

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.mechio.api.motion.Robot
